trans-unit.source: Iterates over the singleton node if the starting node is the same node as the ending node.
trans-unit.target: 如果起始节点是同一节点上作为结束的节点，则循环访问的单一实例节点。

trans-unit.source: Iterates to the end of the document if the starting node is after the ending node or is in a different document.
trans-unit.target: 如果起始节点后的结束节点或不同文档中，则循环到文档末尾。

trans-unit.source: Iterate over the nodes in document order, beginning with the start node through all content-typed nodes that follow the starting node, until the ending node is reached.
trans-unit.target: 循环访问按文档顺序，从开始通过遵循起始节点，直到到达结束的节点的内容类型化的所有节点的开始节点的节点。

trans-unit.source: Nodes that do not match the predicate test are filtered out.
trans-unit.target: 与谓词测试不匹配的节点被筛选出来。

trans-unit.source: The method iterates over the nodes in document order, beginning with the start node through all content-typed nodes that follow the starting node, until the ending node is reached.
trans-unit.target: 该方法循环访问文档顺序，从开始通过遵循起始节点，直到到达结束的节点的内容类型化的所有节点的开始节点中的节点。

trans-unit.source: Nodes that do not match the predicate test are filtered out.
trans-unit.target: 与谓词测试不匹配的节点被筛选出来。

trans-unit.source: Test expression that determines whether a node is to be filtered out.
trans-unit.target: 确定节点是否是要筛选的测试表达式。

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: 导航器更改仅在状态<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法已返回`true`。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next node.
trans-unit.target: 将迭代器定位到下一个节点。

trans-unit.source: If the next node exists, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在下一个节点，MoveNext 方法会设置<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.Current%2A>属性设置为当前结果导航器; 否则为<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.Current%2A>属性保持不变。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the next node exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果下一个节点存在;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
